content.raw:
`playback.launch` is in `vrx_gazebo` package and your suggestion should go in `wamv_description/package.xml`. It doesn’t work and I suspect is because they’re in different packages. Maybe we’re doing something wrong and that should magically propagate…

I agree that for consistency we should use `package.xml` but it doesn’t seem to work unless we’re missing something.
